svg.title: SVG 2.0 Text Wrapping
svg.desc: Tests inline-size and shape-inside for automatic text wrapping
svg.text: This is a long text that should automatically wrap to multiple lines based on the inline-size property.
This text flows inside a rounded rectangle shape using shape-inside property from SVG 2.0.
Preserving multiple spaces and line breaks
Pre-wrap mode preserves spaces but wraps text when needed.
